sen.j: 海軍記念館（かいぐんきねんかん）は京都府舞鶴市にある舞鶴総監部内にある展示施設。
sen.e: Navy Memorial Museum is an exhibit facility placed in Maizuru District Headquarters in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
The Navy Memorial Museum is an exhibition facility located in Maizuru District Headquarters in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
The Navy Memorial Museum is an exhibition facility located in Maizuru District Headquarters in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 海軍記念館は、自衛隊員の教育に資することを目的として1964年（昭和39年）5月27日に舞鶴地方総監部大講堂（旧海軍機関学校大講堂）の一部を利用して設置された。
sen.e: To educate SDF personnel, Navy Memorial Museum was established on May 27, 1964, using part of the big auditorium of Maizuru District Headquarters (the big auditorium of former Naval Engineering College).

The Navy Memorial Museum was established on May 27, 1964 to educate SDF personnel, utilizing part of the large auditorium of Maizuru District Headquarters (the large auditorium of the former Naval Engineering College).

The Navy Memorial Museum was established on May 27, 1964 to educate Self-Difence Forces personnel, utilizing part of the large auditorium of Maizuru District Headquarters (the large auditorium of the former Naval Engineering College).
sen.cmt: 用語集の表記に修正SDF personnel → Self-Difense Forces personnel

sen.j: 1901年（明治34年）に舞鶴の地に舞鶴鎮守府が設置された。
sen.e: Maizuru Chinjufu (Maizuru Naval District) was established in Maizuru in 1901.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Maizuru Chinjufu (Maizuru Naval District) was established in Maizuru in 1901.
Maizuru Chinjufu (Maizuru Naval Base) was established in Maizuru in 1901.
sen.cmt: 用語集の表記に修正Maizuru Naval District → Maizuru Naval Base

sen.j: 初代司令長官に赴任した東郷平八郎元帥に関する資料の他に、大日本帝国海軍の資料が約500点展示されている。
sen.e: In this museum, approx. 500 items of materials related to Imperial Japanese Navy (IJN) are exhibited in addition to those related to marshal Heihachiro TOGO who became the first admiral of Maizuru Chinjufu.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: In this museum, approximately 500 items of material related to the Imperial Japanese Navy (IJN) are exhibited in addition to those related to Marshal Heihachiro TOGO who became the first admiral of Maizuru Chinjufu.

In this museum, approximately 500 items of material related to the Imperial Japanese Navy (IJN) are exhibited in addition to those related to Marshal Heihachiro TOGO who became the first admiral of Maizuru Chinjufu.

sen.j: なお、土日祝日の9時から16時に一般公開されるが、見学希望の団体は事前に申し込みが必要である。
sen.e: The museum are open to the public during 9: 00 to 16: 00 on Saturdays, Sundays and holidays, but the groups who desire to visit there must apply for the visit in advance.
The museum is open to the public between 9: 00 and 16: 00 on Saturdays, Sundays and holidays, but a group wishing to visit must apply for permission in advance.
The museum is open to the public between 9: 00 and 16: 00 on Saturdays, Sundays and holidays, but a group wishing to visit must apply for permission in advance.

sen.j: JR舞鶴線・東舞鶴駅より京都交通 (舞鶴)西舞鶴行きに乗車、ユニバーサル造船前バス停で下車し約3分。
sen.e: Get on a bus of Kyoto Kotsu (based on Maizuru) bound for Nishi-Maizuru from Higashi-Maizuru Station of the JR Maizuru Line, get off it at the bus stop in front of the Universal zosen (ship-building) company, and walk for approx. three minutes.

From Higashi-Maizuru Station on the JR Maizuru Line take the Kyoto Kotsu (Maizuru) bus bound for Nishi-Maizuru, getting off at the bus stop in front of the Universal Zosen (ship-building) company, and walk for approximately three minutes.
sen.cmt: Order changed for clarity, grammar, abbreviation avoided.
sen.e: From Higashi Maizuru Station on the JR Maizuru Line take the Kyoto Kotsu (Maizuru) bus bound for Nishi Maizuru, getting off at, and walk for approximately three minutes.
sen.cmt: 用語集の表記に修正Higashi-Maizuru Station → Higashi Maizuru Starionthe bus stop in front of the Universal Zosen (ship-building) company →Universal Zosen mae Bus Stop (a bus stop in front of Universal Shipbuilding Corporation)Nishi-Maizuru → Nishi Maizuru

sen.j: 問い合わせ
海上自衛隊舞鶴地方総監部電話交換係（電話番号：0773-62-2250）音声案内のあとに「広報係｣と。
sen.e: The telephone exchange section at Maritime Self-Defense Force Maizuru District Headquarters (telephone number: 0773-62-2250): Try to reach "a public relations officer" following an audio guidance.
The telephone exchange section at the Maritime Self-Defense Force Maizuru District Headquarters (telephone number: 0773-62-2250): select "a public relations officer" following the audio guidance.
The telephone exchange section at the Maritime Self-Defense Force Maizuru District Headquarters (telephone number: 0773-62-2250): select "a public relations officer" following the audio guidance.

sen.j: 舞鶴赤レンガ倉庫群（12棟の煉瓦倉庫群）

Red Brick Warehouses (a group of 12 brick warehouse buildings)
